name: routed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
route
to send something somewhere using a particular way or direction: Deliveries are routed via/by way of London.
internet & telecoms to send information from one computer network to another: When a customer buys, the purchase order is routed via the internet to each supplier's personal Web page.
